parameters.name: ActionType
parameters.description: The type of the action. Valid values: SET: adds the pay-as-you-go tag. CANCEL: removes the pay-as-you-go tag.

parameters.name: ClearCycle
parameters.description: The cycle in which the account is notified of payment. **You do not need to specify this parameter.

parameters.name: CreditAmount
parameters.description: The credit line of the account.

parameters.name: CurrencyCode
parameters.description: The code of currency that is used. Valid values: USD and CNY.

parameters.name: DailyCycle
parameters.description: The cycle in which payment can be deferred. **You do not need to specify this parameter.

parameters.name: IsNeedAddSettleLabel
parameters.description: Specifies whether to add the post-settlement tag. **You do not need to specify this parameter.

parameters.name: IsNeedAdjustCreditAccount
parameters.description: Specifies whether to synchronize the monthly settlement tag. **You do not need to specify this parameter.

parameters.name: IsNeedSaveNotifyRule
parameters.description: Specifies whether to save the notification rule. **You do not need to specify this parameter.

parameters.name: IsNeedSetCreditAmount
parameters.description: Specifies whether to set a credit line. **You do not need to specify this parameter.

parameters.name: NeedNotice
parameters.description: Specifies whether to notify the account of an identity change. **You do not need to specify this parameter.

parameters.name: NewCreateMode
parameters.description: Specifies whether to call another operation to create a credit ledger. **You do not need to specify this parameter.

parameters.name: Operator
parameters.description: The operator who performs the action.

parameters.name: SiteCode
parameters.description: The code of the site. **You do not need to specify this parameter.

parameters.name: Uid
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account.
